segments.text: I notice the boy on the stool, reaching for cookies like he’s done this before.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks like it’s about to tip over any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He’s balancing so precariously, but he doesn’t seem to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is waiting for him to hand her a cookie, her hand outstretched.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think they’ve both forgotten about the water all over the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is still drying dishes, completely oblivious to the mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she’ll notice before someone falls.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cookie jar is almost empty now, thanks to them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they don’t break anything when the stool finally tips.
segments.speaker: PAR
